channel.title: Finish Half-Life 2+eps before Black Mesa?
channel.description:
:retard:
So I tried to finish Half-Life 2 and its Episodes before Black Mesa came out, but there was a surprise announcement of the game. Now I am stuck with the question of if I should beat Half-Life 2(+eps) or just play Black Mesa. The thing is that I dislike Half-Life 2 overall and don't want to replay it again.
So I am faced with the question: Do I just not play Half-Life 2 (because Black Mesa is going to ruin it by being a better game) or do I postpone Black Mesa? I've only been waiting three years for it.
I know this is silly, but because of my schedule and certain circumstances I only really have any opportunity to play on the weekends. I've just been juggling this question through weekdays and I still can't decide.
It's pretty much refusing to play a better game because you want to get the plot of a worse game which might make the experience with the better game better... The trouble comes from that I'm being too wishy-washy. So instead of just deciding on the spot I'm going to present it here so that I don't make a another small decision I end up regretting.
